name: The Litlle Seed...
description:
In this Game you play as Sunflower seed that has a destiny of find many nutrients as he can for grow healthy and nourished. Each level you  will fight with the evil pea who try to finish your journey. 

Mechanics: As you controll the Seed, go to the top of the level by climbing the platform and try to find the portal to the next fae, but be carefull with the enemyes, they chase you and will try to make you fall each Level.

Controls: 

Press "Space" - to Jump.

W,A,S & D -  to move.

D - move front.

A- move towards.

W & S - Derictionals.

Mouse - to Rotate Camera.
